short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The reporting helper for JIRA system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to improve reporting experience inside JIRA system. Main features: reporting templates; reporting based on commits (SVN, Git); close issue with reset remaining estimate.
